message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.SI 

This paper is about sentiment analysis on Twitter data, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). The paper proposes a method for learning sentiment-specific word embeddings to improve the performance of Twitter sentiment classification. This topic is closely related to several sub-categories of CS, including computational linguistics (cs.CL), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), information retrieval (cs.IR), and social and information networks (cs.SI).
